statements: UPDATE LivestockData SET weight = 750.25, last_vaccination_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE ID = 1;
UPDATE LivestockData SET breed = 'Angus', mother_id = 10, father_id = 15 WHERE livestock_type = 'Cattle';
UPDATE LivestockData SET last_vaccination_date = '2021-10-15', weight = 520.75 WHERE ID = 3;
UPDATE LivestockData SET weight = 480.50, breed = 'Angus', mother_id = 7 WHERE livestock_type = 'Cow';
UPDATE Livestock SET age = 5, weight = 350.75 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE BreedingRecords SET number_of_offspring = 7, mating_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE record_id = 201;
UPDATE Livestock SET age = age + 1, weight = weight * 1.1 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE BreedingRecords SET number_of_offspring = number_of_offspring + 3, mating_date = '2022-06-10' WHERE record_id = 201;
UPDATE Livestock SET birth_date = '2021-05-20', weight = 450.75, name = 'Cow' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE BreedingRecords SET breeding_type = 'Natural Mating' WHERE livestock_id = 3;
UPDATE Livestock SET name='Bella', breed='Angus', birth_date='2018-05-20', gender='F', weight=650.75 WHERE id=101;
UPDATE BreedingRecords SET breeding_date='2021-03-15', breeding_type='Natural Breeding' WHERE livestock_id=201;
UPDATE Livestock SET Age = 3 WHERE ID = 1;
UPDATE BreedingRecords SET Description = 'New breeding description' WHERE LivestockID = 2;
UPDATE Livestock SET Age = 5, Breed = 'Angus' WHERE ID = 101;
UPDATE HealthRecords SET HealthCondition = 'Healthy', RecordDate = '2022-07-15' WHERE LivestockID = 201;
UPDATE Livestock SET age = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE HealthRecords SET condition = 'Healthy', treatment = 'Regular checkup' WHERE livestock_id = 3;
UPDATE Livestock SET age = 3, breed = 'Angus' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE BreedingRecords SET status = 'Pregnant', notes = 'Requires special care' WHERE livestock_id = 5;
